    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void calculate(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      calculate method calculate the number of stop words and happax if a word have less than or equal to 4 letters and it appears more than 10 times, it's a stop word otherwise, it's happax
      static void deleteDuplicate(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      deleteDuplicate method detect duplicate entries in arrayList, delete them and increase the frequency
      static void displayArr(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      displayArr method
      static boolean isWord(java.lang.String s)
      isWord method verify if a string only contains letters
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main method
      static void sortArr(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
      sortArr method sort the arrayList according to the frequency of the objects if two objects have same frequency, sort them according to alphabet order

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String s)
        isWord method verify if a string only contains letters
        参数:
        s - string
        返回:
        true if only contains letters

      • displayArr

        public static void displayArr(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
        displayArr method
        参数:
        a - ArrayList

      • deleteDuplicate

        public static void deleteDuplicate(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
        deleteDuplicate method detect duplicate entries in arrayList, delete them and increase the frequency
        参数:
        a - arrayList

      • sortArr

        public static void sortArr(java.util.ArrayList<Word> a)
        sortArr method sort the arrayList according to the frequency of the objects if two objects have same frequency, sort them according to alphabet order
        参数:
        a - arrayList

        参数:
        a - arrayList
